Headline: #52 Kedzie Temporary Reroute at Kedzie/Cermak
ShortDescription: 52 Kedzie buses are rerouted in both directions via Kedzie, Cermak, Marshall, 26th, Kedzie over regular route, due to street blockage near Kedzie/Cermak.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#52 Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Kedzie, Cermak, Marshall, 26th, Kedzie over regular route, due to street blockage near Kedzie/Cermak.

Allow extra travel time.
